input.sentences: the family was all together for thanksgiving .
[male] was shocked when he seen his brothers getting into a fight .
they beat each other up pretty bad .
so bad that grandma had to come downstairs and make them stop .
after the fight everyone chilled out while the food was being made .
output.sentences: Ron was unimpressed when his twin brother Rodger announced that he wanted a career change.
In fact, the family was shocked by his new choice.
Little cousin Colin didn't have a strong opinion, but he realized something was upsetting others in the family.
Granny , the family comedian, said, "If you are going to be a male model, try this for size."
Everyone watched television the night  Rodger was in his first commercial.
